${modID}:build.NAME: Build
${modID}:build.DESCRIPTION: Build a Wooden Automaton. NL ${modID}:Consume the Program.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:tazer.NAME: Tazer
${modID}:tazer.DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable.
${modID}:tazer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage. NL Apply 2 Weak. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable.

${modID}:defensesystem.NAME: Defense System
${modID}:defensesystem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 5 Block. NL Program a ${modID}:Defend 5. NL Program a ${modID}:Weaken.

${modID}:frenzy.NAME: Frenzied Construction
${modID}:frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Build 3 Plastic Automata. NL ${modID}:Consume the Program. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:frenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Build 3 Plastic Automata. NL ${modID}:Consume the Program.
